comment._content: William Allaire Shortt, Democrat, who represents Richmond county in the Assembly, was born in Florence, Mass., on August 15, 1859. He was graduated by the University of Toronto in 1880. After graduating he traveled in Europe during 1880 ... I started and entry in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Allaire_Shortt
